name: natural ground
description: The natural interface between the atmosphere and the terrestrial globe (sphere), not artificially elevated with respect to the nearby surrounding area (on a scale of 50 meters)

name: artificial ground
description: The artificial interface between the atmosphere and the terrestrial globe (sphere), not artificially elevated with respect to the nearby surrounding area (on a scale of 50 meters)

name: sea surface
description: The natural interface between the atmosphere and the ocean

name: ship deck
description: A permanent covering over a compartment or the body of a ship. Also the horizontal structure that forms the roof of the hull, elevated with respect to the surrounding sea surface

name: building roof
column4: elevated with respect to the surrounding local ground

name: (inapplicable)
description: None of the codes in the table are applicable in the context of the reference surface
